remarks: Law for group multiplication and division.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
abldiv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
abldiv.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
ablomuldiv $p |- ( ( G e. AbelOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) D C ) = ( ( A D C ) G B ) ) $.
